Tool

NameAdd Point Attributes to Polygons
ID20
AuthorV. Wichmann (c) 2014

Description

Spatial join for polygons. Retrieves for each polygon the selected attributes from that point, which is contained in the polygon. In case a polygon contains more than one point, the last point wins. Optionally, the module allows one to attach the geometrical properties (x,y(z,m)) of each point as additional attributes.
